1351.content:
Samus's helmet and much of her tattered zero suit were tugged away by currents as she sank deeper and deeper into the dark briny depths. The lack of air and the bitter cold made her pass out, but she didn't drown. Without a panicked mind messing about, her body was able to conserve what little air she had. After several long minutes, her mostly naked form came to rest in a small fissure at the bottom of the sea. Unfortunately for Samus, this was not truly a fissure but the open mouth of a giant clam which, sensing her tasty weight pressing down on it, swiftly closed and trapped her inside.
         About two hours later, Samus came to in complete darkness. It took her a moment to be certain her sudden blindness was due to the light, not her eyes. Feeling her way around, she ascertained that she was inside a very warm slimy chamber small enough that she had to stay half-curled in the fetal position. She figured it was the extreme heat that had revived her, that and the readily available supply of oxygen coming from who-knows-where. The bounty hunter stopped squirming and tried to take stock of her situation. Her zero suit was gone entirely now (this bothered her slightly; she could remember having at least a third of it still hanging on her when she fell unconscious). Her total nudity would be highly embarrassing when she got back to civilization and would make the trip across the planet's frozen surface much harder, but hardship and embarrassment could both be endured. No, now that she though about it, her biggest problem would be escaping from..wherever she was. In all her feeling around, Samus hadn't discovered an exit in the squishy folds of material around her. In frustration (and due to her legs starting to cramp) she pushed down with her feet and out with her back as hard as she could. She was rewarded by a slight movement on both ends. Summoning all her strength, Samus pushed.
         Ice-cold water flooded down through a gap above her head, bringing with it the faintest of lights. Encouraged but tired, she pushed her head and shoulders up through the freezing torrent and looked around the dimly lit seabed. A stream of bubbles left her mouth as she gasped, realizing her predicament for the first time. From the neck down her body was trapped inside a gigantic clam. The surface was dauntingly far away, and the water pressure was, despite her best efforts, driving her back into her captor's maw. After a few seconds she could hold on no longer. Samus let her exhausted muscles go limp. The freezing sea drove her back into the soft flesh of the clam which then closed around her. Within minutes all the water was drained and the tiny chamber was once again filled with warm moist air.
         Samus settled back into the cushion-like flesh enveloping her, pondering what to do. She didn't know just what would happen to a person eaten by a clam, but she didn't fell like finding out.

Samus is dropped, only to land on the raptor, who looks back at her and seems to wink.
She looks up as the Flying Pirate and humanoid fight, with much screeching and blood.
She gives a cry as the Pirate falls to its death when the other slashes it with its bendizium blade.
The raptor pulls up suddenly, catching Samus in its claw as she falls off. The rider lands on his creature, and smiles down at Samus, who is being held upside down.
She bares her teeth and yells at it to quit looking at her, but it either doesn't understand, or just ignores the demand.
1523.title: a creature came from behind

153.content: Right before Samus can decide she is grabbed by Ridley by his claws and is carried away. Ridley carried Samus to a mountain and set her down. Ridley still had a whole in his stomach and couldn't do much because so. Samus noticed this and two thoughts ran through her head. She could run away or she could help Ridley and maybe Ridley will like her. Samus decided to...
153.title: Grabbed by Ridley

info.brief_description: Samus finds herself at the bottom of the food chain... GP for new chapters!
info.description:
The GP amount depends on how well-written your chapter is. Generally, if you try, and make a decent addition, you get around 300. 500 for good chapters. It may take me a while to accumulate some of this money, so first come, first serve, and then we'll see what I can do. Reviews will also get points, but I didn't want to have auto-rewards for poory written cash-scams.

Now, on with the story.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

It all happened so quickly Samus didn't see it coming.

She had been patrolling the snow-covered, rocky ground near a federation base when she heard an all-to familiar screech. Before she could so much as turn around, she felt sharp talons dig themselves into the ribs of her metallic suit. She could feel the hot breath on the back of her neck through her suit as Ridley took into the dark sky with his prey. Naturally, Samus tried to escape by slipping between his claws in her morph ball, as she usually did.

This is where things changed.

She couldn't see inside the morphball. but Samus was certain that she felt an immediate heat engulf her. For a few seconds, silence. The rushing winds of the icy planet had been muted.

And then came the pain.

Samus attempted to drop a morphball bombs, but whatever the cause of this pain was, it had already disabled her bombs. In an attempt to understand what was going on, she deactivated her morphball and was met by sllimy, cramped wall. It was only then that she realized where she was: Ridley's stomach.

She attempted every means of escape, to no avail. One after another, her systems were being digested and disabled by Ridley's acid. Her powersuit, suit, save her helmet, had been erased entirely. It was only a matter of time before the acids digested her zero suit. Samus, the powerful hunter, was reduced to kicking and screaming desperately.

Somehow, something went right. She heard a loud screech of pain, and watched as the bottom half of Ridley's stomach literally tore open, sending her half-nude form plummeting through the night sky...
